alert.note: Alert for Mohave (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 26 at 3:39PM MST until August 26 at 5:30PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected on the Hualapai Indian Reservation between Grand Canyon West and Peach Springs. * WHERE...A portion of northwest Arizona, including the following county, Mohave. * WHEN...Until 530 PM MST. * IMPACTS...Rises in small streams and normally dry washes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 338 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms has ended. However, minor flooding of normally dry washes will continue in the advisory area. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Iron Spring Wash, Grapevine Wash, Lost Man Creek, Reference Point Creek, Truxton Wash, Peach Springs Wash, Colorado River, Rock Canyon, Surprise Canyon, Spencer Canyon and Lost Creek. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Peach Springs. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
